directions: Preheat oven to 400°F. Combine first 7 ingredients in 9-inch square baking dish. Bake 15 minutes.
Top hot tomato mixture with snapper. Brush snapper with oil. Season with salt and pepper. Cover and bake until fish is just cooked through, approximately 20 minutes. Serve.
ingredients: 12 ounces (2 small or 1 large) 3/4-inch-thick red snapper fillet
title: Baked Red Snapper with Tomato, Orange and Saffron
